originalTitle: More than 160 churchgoers kidnapped in twin Nigeria attacks - clergy
title: More than 160 churchgoers kidnapped in twin Nigeria attacks - clergy
content: Police say armed gangs burst into the two churches in Kurmin Wali, Kaduna state, during Sunday service.

title: Drums, chants and celebrations as Ethiopians mark the baptism of Jesus
content: The Ethiopian Orthodox festival of Timket, or Epiphany, commemorates the baptism of Jesus in the Jordan.

title: My children were recruited in a trafficking scam. I joined a police hunt to find them
content: BBC Africa Eye joins an anti-trafficking police unit in Sierra Leone helping a man look for his missing children.

content: Norway PM Jonas Gahr Store rebuked Donald Trump after after text exchange involving Greenland and the Nobel Peace Prize.

title: Trump’s Gaza ‘Board of Peace’ draws scepticism
content: US President Donald Trump has unveiled a proposed “Board of Peace” aimed at rebuilding Gaza.

originalTitle: US Fed Chair Powell to attend Supreme Court session on Cook case: Report
title: US Fed Chair Powell to attend Supreme Court session on Cook case: Report
content: Powell appears to be casting off last year’s more subdued response to Trump’s repeated attacks on the Fed, AP reported.

originalTitle: Trump says he will '100%' carry out Greenland tariffs threat, as EU vows to protect its interests
title: Trump says he will '100%' carry out Greenland tariffs threat, as EU vows to protect its interests
content: Kaja Kallas, the EU's foreign policy chief, said the bloc has "no interest to pick a fight, but we will hold our ground".

title: 'Europe is at a total loss': Russia gloats over Greenland tensions
content: The BBC's Russia editor Steve Rosenberg analyses why pro-Russian government papers are full of praise for Donald Trump's desire to buy Greenland.

originalTitle: Italian fashion designer Valentino dies aged 93
title: Italian fashion designer Valentino dies aged 93
content: One of the giants of 20th century fashion, his creations were worn by celebrities including Elizabeth Taylor, Julia Roberts and Gwyneth Paltrow.

title: Under-pressure Frank 'feeling trust' of Spurs board
